about.1: I'm a dev and math enthusiast focusing on React, Node, and Rust. Currently, I work as a software engineer at Laika, where I build scalable and distributed systems that handle complex data and workflows.
about.2: In this space, I plan to share some of my personal reflections and insights on topics related to engineering complex systems and statistics.
about.3: I'm an advocate of open-source software and enjoy contributing to the community through various projects.
